alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN FRESNO COUNTY THROUGH 530 AM PDT... At 500 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 28 miles west of North Lake Campground, or 30 miles west of Aspendell, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Tamarack Summit, Upper Burnt Corral, Dinkey Creek, and Florence Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP
